{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15012v1", "title": "Frequency Comb-based Wavelength Division Multiplexing and Detection
  without Wavelength Demultiplexers", "summary": "We demonstrate a wavelength division multiplexing (WDM) concept using
demultiplexer-free frequency combs at both transmitter and receiver in a
4-wavelength 200-GHz-grid WDM system with flexible symbol rates, aiming to
avoid the power-hungry wavelength control on demultiplexers.", "main_category": "physics.optics", "categories": "physics.optics,eess.SP", "published": "2025-04-21T10:30:53Z"}
